summary: James P. Kelly was an employee of the Select Committee on Assassinations (SCAS). He is listed in payroll and certification reports from April 1978 to December 1978. These documents provide his name, social security number, annual salary, and gross pay during his employment with the committee. The documents indicate his continued employment with the SCAS throughout the specified period.
significance: James P. Kelly's significance lies in his employment with the Select Committee on Assassinations. The payroll and certification documents serve as records of his employment and compensation during the committee's investigation.
